query:

SET topThingsToDo = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ‹ Whale Shark Diving', 'description', 'Whale shark research sanctuary with 70% encounter success rate'),

foodCafes = JSON_ARRAY(

)
